means: 爱开玩笑地，乱引人发笑的

sentence.Network_en: The woman eyed him coldly. "Don't be facetious," she said.
sentence.Network_cn: 妇人冷冷地看着他，说道：“别没正经了。”

sentence.Network_en: Facetious remarks are part of his stock - in - trade.
sentence.Network_cn: 讲俏皮话是他的拿手好戏.

sentence.Network_en: Keep it, in any case, familiar, facetious even, rather then pedantic and portentous.
sentence.Network_cn: 无论如何, 要使它显得很随便, 甚至滑稽可笑, 而不要显得很迂腐,夜郎自大.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 扬子江-GRE填空词汇分类汇总_百度文库 ... contentious 好争吵的 facetious 幽默的 presumptuous 专横的.
英语褒义形容词形容朋友的_百度知道 ... experienced 有经验的 facetious 滑稽的，爱开玩笑的 gentle 温和优雅的.
Efacetious a. 诙谐的；爱开玩笑的；滑稽的￼
facade n．建筑物的正面,外表facetious adj．轻浮的，好开玩笑的facile adj．容易做的,肤浅的.

list.abs: as if the poor parson had said a rarely facetious thing ., 好像这个可怜的人刚刚说了什么可笑的事情.
She kept interrupting our discussion with facetious remarks ., 她不断用开玩笑的话干扰我们的讨论.
I became angry with the little boy at his facetious remarks .我对这个小男孩过分的玩笑变得发火了。
facetiae 诙谐书，淫书facetious story 滑稽故事facsimile 传真版

" Of course , wait a moment . " Claud smiled , " The champion would not mind coaching the beginner . " He was used to speak to Carl in a confident and facetious tone .“当然，我马上就来。”小伙子给了同伴一个微笑，“冠军是不会介意指导初学者的。”他习惯于用这种自信和幽默的口吻与卡尔调侃。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (in the general sense 'witty, amusing'): from French facétieux, from facétie, from Latin facetia 'jest', from facetus 'witty'

entry.tran: (不分场合)乱开玩笑的，贫嘴的
entry.def: If you say that someone is being facetious, you are criticizing them because they are making humorous remarks or saying things that they do not mean in a situation where they ought to be serious.

example.ex: The woman eyed him coldly. 'Don't be facetious,' she said.
example.tran: 妇人冷冷地看着他，说道：“别没正经了。”

auth_sentence.content: The mud puddle analogy is not as facetious as it may sound.
auth_sentence.res_content: The mud puddle analogy is not as facetious as it may sound.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The mud puddle analogy is not as facetious as it may sound.
